titleStmt.title: []ily in tears: ... [e]legy, ... []ed death of his Grace ... Duke of Gloucester, ... [p]allace at Windsor, on Tuesday the 30th· ... [y]ear of his age.

notesStmt.note: Lamenting the death of William, Duke of Gloucester, who died at Windsor Monday the 29th of July, 1700.
Verse: "But tis our sins, makes fatal stars combine ..."
Fragment: torn affecting title and text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
